titlestmt.titleproper: 19th century bibliography of dictionaries, religious works, and Bibles in many languages undated
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

publicationstmt.publisher: University of Pennsylvania, Rare Book and Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: 19th century bibliography of dictionaries, religious works, and Bibles in many languages
did.repository: University of Pennsylvania, Rare Book and Manuscript Library

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a manuscript bibliography of dictionaries, religious works, and Bibles. Works included in the bibliography date from the 16th to the 19th century. The works are in many languages, including English, French, German, Russian, Greek, Italian, Armenian, Basque, several Indic Languages, Chinese, and many others. The bibliography appears to have been compiled in the late 19th century.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
